item.description:
We will wait 10 minutes for any late comers.

If you need to call me, my cell number is: (508) 559-3677

We can walk the entire length of the beach and back.
item.how_to_find_us: Park along the beach wall. Do NOT park in The Red Parrot parking lot! We will meet down on the beach. Look for a big, black, longhaired dog.
item.why: Two of our members, Carl and Sarah suggested this and I think it would be a nice change.
item.name: A Day at the Beach! (Nantasket Beach)
